smg.text: Very dry. Fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Very dry. Fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
